title: Connection Issues (Riot side?)
body:
I just queued up for a game for Howling Abyss, got through champion select and loaded to 100% on load screen. The person i was playing with told me the game started so i ctrl+alt+delete end process tree for the game/client.
Upon reconnecting and getting in, i bought my items, walked to turret and then immediately disconnected. There was no "attempting to reconnect" and upon manually reconnecting multiple times (and resetting my router) i still was disconnecting after 10 seconds or not being able to connect at all.
I tried reconnecting maybe like 5-10 times before i gave up.
I've got 0 connection problems atm (was on skype the whole time i was disconnecting) so hopefully this is a heads up for riot to fix the problem.

replies.body:
I have the exact same problem
Specs are as follows:
intel core i7 4790k
amd r9 290
asrock z97 xtreme4 mobo
Netgear WNA3100 N300 wireless adapter
Windows 7 OS
EVGA SuperNOVA 750 G2 Power Supply
I previously played 2 matches prior to this bug but after it happened i looked on google for recent bugs(within a month) relating to this exact problem and found this post which described exactly what happened to me. reconnecting sometimes reconnects to the game sometimes it stops midway, and 1-20 seconds later randomly just stop moving and everything in the game stops updating with no attempting to reconnect screen but with good ping

Servers op.

Which ISP are you with?
Also just a note i was playing ranked summoners rift before this with 0 problems.
